rows.label: qst300103_msg101
rows.name:
So I hear you're making rations?
If I find anything I can help with,
I'll ask Zuo to let you know.

rows.label: qst300103_msg103
rows.name:
Oh, you found the Mokmo Onion!
Go on then, take it to the campfire
and make the Dried Scented Salmon.

rows.label: qst300103_msg104
rows.name:
...That's quite the powerful scent...
I'm sure it's a sign of how nutritious
it is, but still...wow. Pungent.

rows.label: qst300103_msg001
rows.name:
Hey, I hear you're collecting
ingredients for rations, is that right?

rows.label: qst300103_msg002
rows.name:
Then you should try and get your
hands on a Mokmo Onion!

rows.label: qst300103_msg003
rows.name:
Sorry, I guess that was a bit sudden.
It's supposed to be a really nutritious
ingredient, so it's perfect for rations.

rows.label: qst300103_msg004
rows.name:
They grow on Lasqam Island in
Gula, but they're buried really deep,
so you don't see them in shops much.

rows.label: qst300103_msg005
rows.name:
It shouldn't be too hard to find the
place where they grow, but actually
obtaining them might be a challenge.

rows.label: qst300103_msg006
rows.name:
Still, a Mokmo Onion or two would
make for perfect Dried Scented
Salmon, so it's definitely worth a try!

rows.label: qst300103_msg007
rows.name:
I'll give you the Breath Charcoal
and Steel Salmon and you can get
the Mokmo Onion. Don't give up!

rows.label: qst300103_msg008
rows.name: Don't give up the search, will you?
